data.detailedDescription:
Want to check out some Asian Idols at a JAV database like Jav Library? Believe it or not, not every porn site actually provides you directly with porn. There are many types of porn sites out there: porn tube sites, porn aggregator sites, porn archive sites, purely informational sites, and porn libraries. Each kind of site, of course, has its own special features, strengths, and drawbacks. What type you end up choosing depends entirely on your own goals.

If you just want to have immediate, free access to a shit ton of porn so that you can cum as soon as possible, for example, you will probably fair best with a tube site such as Porn Hub, Red Tube, or xHamster. The downside with these sites, though, is that full-length movies samples are few and far between, so you’ll have to be okay with shorter scenes or clips of scenes (particularly if you’re trying to watch content from the top-tier, professional studios).

Porn aggregator sites, on the other hand, will be good for the pornoholic who has a little extra time on his hands (time that he hopes to, eventually, turn into cum on his hands). Porn aggregator sites do exactly what their title suggests. They aggregate porn from various sources. One could easily fall down the rabbit hole of clicking on one video, being led to another site, clicking on videos on that other site, being led to another site, etc. This could go on for hours.

Porn aggregator sites are great, however, for the porn addict who craves variety or just wants to find a new go-to free tube site. I can’t even begin to tell you how many awesome little-known porn sites I have discovered from clicking through aggregator sites. It’s a great way to stumble upon new sites, girls, studios, or kinks. They’re great for discovery.

There is another type of porn site out there, though, that is far less common than tubes or aggregators, yet just as useful for accomplishing a different goal. The porn library or archive site is great for the porn addict on the verge of becoming porn connoisseur. Such sites are awesome for learning everything there is to know about your favorite (18+)girls, films, studios, etc. Although the focus of these sites is not necessarily on viewing the porn in question, there needs to be a resource for gaining knowledge on the porn that we love, and porn libraries do exactly that (and more).

Making Sense of Your Porn Collection

JavLibrary.com also helps porn viewers to never forget the name of a video again. If you watch as much porn as I do (and I know you do), chances are you’ve been in a situation where you’ve seen a thumbnail for a video or a cover for a movie that you cannot, for the life of you, recall the name of. Well, Jav Library seeks to help make sure that this never happens to us again. Simply add a video from their library of titles to your favorites list, allowing you to easily keep track of the seemingly infinite number of pornos out there.

Unsure whether or not a particular movie is going to be worth the time and/or money it will take to track down, download, stream, or maybe even buy? That is not a problem on Jav Library, thanks to their extremely active user base. Feel free to read reviews written by porn lovers just like yourself or write one of your own to help other members of the community. Remember, sharing is caring (unless we’re talking about herpes. You can keep that shit to yourself).

The more I learn about Jav Library, the more convenient it seems to be. As I mentioned before, you can easily save video titles to your own customized lists. With nothing more than the click of a button, add a title to one of three lists to help keep your porn collection (and interests) organized. Each video has its own page dedicated to it (with tons of info on it). Under each title are buttons that allow you to quickly and conveniently add it to one of your three lists: liked videos, videos you are interested in watching, or videos you already own. Never before has it been so easy to be a hardcore Japanese adult videos fan.

Awesome Features, Active Community

Maybe someone from your city owns a copy of a film that you just can’t seem to find anywhere. Feel free to contact that user and try to set up an exchange of some sort! Jav Library is not only a comprehensive informational archive of Japanese porn, but a giant community of Japanese porn lovers; in short, a Jav lover’s paradise.

If the fact that you can’t watch videos directly on Jav Library seems like it would bother you, fear not. As we’ve already established, there is a comments feature. And it is very active. Not only do users utilize the comments section to discuss the films (or scenes within the films) that they love, they also make good use of it by linking to screenshot collections from the movies.

Organization is Key

Once you accept the terms and choose your language, you will immediately be greeted with thumbnails of porn covers. In the middle of the home page, you will find popular videos. Below that is a fun, animated breakdown of how the site works and all of its features. I love me a straightforward and easy to use site like this.

To the left of the thumbnails is the site’s navigation menu, broken into three main sections: Videos, Stars, and Participate. In the Videos section, jump to “New Comments,” “New Releases,” “New Entries,” “Most Wanted,” “Best Rated,” “Advanced Search,” or “Categories.” Stars will lead you to a comprehensive list of the hottest Jav porn stars, either by ranking or an A – Z directory. The Participate section brings you to either the best reviews on the site or the forum (only further bolstering the already extremely active community of Jav Library).

No Porn on a Porn Site?

Jav Library is also absolutely lousy with ads. I understand that they are providing a huge archival site and some awesome community features for free, but still. It is not impossible to offer a great service for free without advertising. Hell, I do it. It just takes a little bit of creativity is all. I would like to see Jav Library embrace alternative revenue streams (or at least calm down with the ads a little bit).

Lastly, although it works works well enough on mobile devices, I think that a site like this could really benefit from having an app. How great would it be to be able to quickly archive porn videos as you watch them or stumble upon them from your smart phone, without having to use your browser at all? An app only makes sense for a user-based library or archiving site whose main goal is making the lives of pornoholics more convenient.

All in all, for what it is, I think that Jav Library is a successful site. Some awesome community features to be exploited, a great way to keep track of and make sense of the millions of Japanese pornos out there to choose from, and an easy way to learn about new films or get an idea for how certain films have been critically received by likeminded people. I think it’s a great idea.
